alert.note: Alert for Adams; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 28 at 8:35AM EST until March 01 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory is cancelled for the following rivers... Ohio River at Meldahl Dam. ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers... Ohio River at Maysville. Ohio River at Cincinnati. Ohio River at Portsmouth. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Ohio River at Portsmouth. * WHEN...Until Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 49.0 feet, Lowland flooding affects southern Scioto County. Backwater flooding begins into the Scioto River, as well as along smaller creeks and streams. State Route 73 is closed near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM EST Monday the stage was 49.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 46.0 feet Tuesday morning. - Action stage is 35.0 feet. - Flood stage is 50.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
